title: Living tomorrow. No. 093
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Motorised binoculars, infra-red lamp for surveying purposes for two people to communicate and speak over distance; cancer prevention and screening; sea trials for catamaran scale models and 52 foot; teacher training classes, micro classes - five people, 25 minute class memory training.
